name: Secret Source Technology SL
tagline: A tech team you’ll love working with
description:
We're a dream team of British PMs, AMs, BAs, and UXers working together with our stellar devs in our sunny home in the Canary Islands.
Team up with us, and you too will discover why NHS, Barclays, British Gas and many other great institutions love working with us so much.
What do we do?
We build enterprise websites and apps - from news sites with millions of users, to social networks, to brochure sites for some of the biggest brands in the world. No project is too big for us.
We build succesful mobile apps - We specialise is cross platform mobile development. With our mobile apps weve reduced bed wastage in the NHS, helped grounbreaking medical apps pass clinical trials and helped many FTSE100 companies test and build some of the products you see in your homes today.
Why choose us?
You can trust us to deliver - Our team has decades of experience delivering hundreds of high quality work to some of the biggest brands in the world. You can rely on us.
Working with us is easy - Same time zone, same language, and same wavelength make working with us a breeze.
We’re based in paradise - Mid-winter meetings near the beach? If you’re going to outsource, outsource to a team you really want to visit, in the Canaries.
READ MORE...
